title: FOLLICLE MIST 8 oz.
description:
Follicle Invigorator Product Description and Benefits:
If you are transitioning out of a perm / relaxer or have dry / damaged hair, this product is a must have! One of our best sellers. PREVENTS BREAKAGE AND PROMOTES LENGTH RETENTION! Healthy hair begins with your scalp. This product delivers a unique blend of essential vitamins, nutrients, herbal extracts and proteins directly to your scalp!  Keep your hair healthy and growing properly. Promotes hair growth, reduces shedding, softens and detangles the hair. This spray has a unique blend of ingredients which helps to stimulate circulation to the scalp. Nourishes, stimulates, revitalizes and rejuvenates the hair follicles. A must have for anyone who wants thicker hair. With regular use, you will notice thicker and fuller hair. Leaves the hair soft and does not weigh the hair down. Not oily. You will love it! For best results, use with other Hydratherma Naturals brand products. Great product which also provides sunscreen protection! PH balanced.

How to use:
Shampoo, deep condition and towel dry. Part hair in 1 inch sections and lightly spray directly on scalp and hair. Massage Scalp. Can be used on wet or dry hair. May use daily.

INGREDIENTS: Water/Aqua, Polysorbate 20, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Propylene Glycol, Fragrance/ Parfum, Wheat Amino Acids, Glycerin, Cinnamidopropyltrimonium Chloride, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Extract, Geranium Maculatum Extract, Achillea Millefolium Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Cymbopogon Schoenanthus Extract, Quercus Alba Bark Extract, Hamamellis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Extract, Rosa Canina Seed Extract, Symphytum Officinale Leaf Extract, Acrylates/PEG-10 Maleate/Styrene Copolymer, Tetrasodium EDTA, Benzophenone-4, Yellow 5/ CI 19140, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone. Paraben Free

title: African Shea Butter Cream (100% Pure & Raw, Gold) 8 Oz.
description: Pure Shea butter is coveted throughout Africa for its natural skin care benefits. Several great benefits of Shea butter are: Use as a shaving cream for a smooth silky shave, stretch mark prevention during pregnancy, fights the effects of aging, repairs rough damaged skin, treatment of dry skin, eczema, minor burns, pain relief from swelling and arthritis, improves muscle relaxation and stiffness, sunscreen, due to its rich content of vitamins E & F, Treats dark spots, skin discolorations, blemishes, diaper rash and as a hair conditioner.

title: Nexxus Emergencee Restorative Strength Conditioning Treatment 3.3 Ounce
